arts.ttl: Watch: Donley nets first Northern Ireland goal in win over Luxembourg
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Jamie Donley scores his first international goal for Northern Ireland in their 1-0 win over Luxembourg in World Cup qualifying.

arts.ttl: Jamie Donley scores his first Northern Ireland goal to seal win over Luxembourg
arts.sum: Donley, making his first competitive Northern Ireland start, converted a 44th-minute penalty to settle a tepid affair.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs Luxembourg – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Northern Ireland are set to welcome Luxembourg to Windsor Park on Monday evening for the final Group A clash of the FIFA World Cup 2026 qualification campaign. Following a late, heartbreaking defeat to Slovakia on Friday, Northern Ireland’s hopes of securing direct qualification have been dashed. arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs Luxembourg – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Northern Ireland host Luxembourg at Windsor Park on Monday evening in their final Group A fixture of the FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifiers. Northern Ireland’s hopes of automatic qualification ended with a heartbreaking stoppage-time defeat to Slovakia on Friday. arts.ttl: Why Luxembourg game matters for Northern Ireland
arts.sum: Before Northern Ireland's final World Cup qualifier with Luxembourg, BBC Sport explains why the dead rubber still matters.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs Luxembourg predictions: Norn Iron to end on a high
arts.sum: While there is nothing to play for in Northern Ireland's home clash against Luxembourg on Monday, James Mason is still expecting an efficient performance from the hosts.
